entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:46 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 33 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:46 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 30 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:46 PM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
